mapper.select: SELECT ku.user_name,kcm.stu_id, ku.user_dept,ku.user_sex,ku.user_addr,ku.user_phone,ku.user_email from k_class_member kcm JOIN k_class kc ON kcm.class_id = kc.class_id JOIN k_users ku on ku.user_id = kcm.stu_id WHERE kc.prof_id = #{userId}

SELECT ku.user_name,kcm.stu_id, ku.user_dept,ku.user_sex,ku.user_addr,ku.user_phone,ku.user_email from k_class_member kcm JOIN k_class kc ON kcm.class_id = kc.class_id JOIN k_users ku on ku.user_id = kcm.stu_id WHERE kc.prof_id = #{userId} and kc.class_id = #{classId};
